source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Barbed Shot at 100% effectiveness. Casting Bestial Wrath always hits a Jackpot!

Set: Hitting a Jackpot! infuses your pet with a mutagen, causing its auto-attacks to deal 17,587 Nature damage to its target and up to 5 enemies within 10 yds for 8 sec. Mutagenic attacks reduce the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 0.3 sec.

spells.description:
Equip: When damaged below 30% health, gain a shield for 8 sec which absorbs up to 1.8 million damage.

This effect can only be triggered once every 4 min but is reduced by 12 sec per unique Algari gem color socketed.

Equip: When damaged below 30% health, gain a shield for 8 sec which absorbs up to 1.8 million damage.

This effect can only be triggered once every 4 min but is reduced by 12 sec per unique Algari gem color socketed.
Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Agility by 12% and your Stamina by 10% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant 8,839 primary stat for 20 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Agility by 12% and your Stamina by 10% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
